text: Gene Zwozdesky, (July 24, 1948 â€“ January 6, 2019) was a Canadian politician. He was in the Legislative Assembly of Alberta from 1993 to 2015, and was the Speaker of the Legislative Assembly from 2012 to 2015. He was born in Nipawin, Saskatchewan. Zwozdesky died of cancer in Edmonton, Alberta on January 6, 2019, aged 70. ==References== ==Other websites== *Alberta Legislative Assembly biography Gene Zwozdesky *Edmonton Mill Creek political history, CBC News Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Canada Category:Politicians from Alberta Category:Politicians from Saskatchewan
title: Gene Zwozdesky
